snippet: Bishop Nicholas A. DiMarzio has not joined in criticizing Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez in a sexual harassment scandal, but their alliance may have foundered over gay marriage.
abstract: Bishop Nicholas A DiMarzio, head of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Brooklyn, is conspicuously absent from widespread criticism of Assemblyman Vito J Lopez in a sexual harassment scandal; political analysts point out that DiMarzio, who oversees a diocese with deep budget troubles, depends on maintaining beneficial political alliances as part of his job.
lead_paragraph: Bishop Nicholas A. DiMarzio has not joined in criticizing Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez in a sexual harassment scandal, but their alliance may have foundered over gay marriage.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Bishop’s Close Ties With Vito Lopez May Be Frayed
headline.main: In Brooklyn, Lopez’s Ties to a Bishop Seem Frayed
headline.print_headline: In Brooklyn, Lopez’s Ties To a Bishop Seem Frayed

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
